predicate.note: Frames file for 'specify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'determine'

example.name: specify a WH-phrase
example.text: Mr. Edelman declined *trace* to specify what prompted the recent moves

example.name: specify an NP
example.text: First Interstate said its operations outside of Arizona ``achieved results as expected for the quarter,'' but didn't specify the results.
